abstract: Death toll rises to 69 as rescue workers continue to search for bodies and potential survivors buried in rubble of massive mudslide in suburb of Guatemala City; more than 300 people remain unaccounted for.
lead_paragraph: Many people remain missing after a rain-sodden hillside collapsed Thursday night in a neighborhood on the outskirts of Guatemala City.

headline.main: Frantic Search for Survivors in Guatemala After Mudslide Kills 69
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | The Americas; Guatemala: Rescuers Search for Mudslide Survivors

snippet: Many people remain missing after a rain-sodden hillside collapsed Thursday night in a neighborhood on the outskirts of Guatemala City.
